title: Oracle Certified Associate
description: Acquired Oracle Certified Associate, Java SE 8 Programmer Certification with 92% in May 2017.

title: Research Work - Automatic Plant Detection
description: Worked on 'Automatic Plant Species Recognition Technique Using Machine Learning Approaches' and built a working model during the academic project. Research paper presented at CoCoNet'15, IEEE. Published in IEEE (https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/7411268).

title: Infrastructure Automation Excellence
description: Automated microservices deployment and management using Ansible, reducing manual interventions by 40% at Tracxn Technologies.

title: Technical Mentorship
description: Provided technical mentorship to new team members at Walmart Global Tech, improving onboarding efficiency and knowledge sharing.

title: System Stability Enhancement
description: Automated recurring operational fixes and productionized changes to enhance system stability and reduce downtime at Walmart Global Tech.

title: Generative AI Exploration
description: Building an AI-powered photo app to ease posting for enthusiastic social media users. Exploring prompt engineering & model fine-tuning to improve AI-generated insights and response accuracy.
